newSeason.title: New this season
newSeason.subtitle: Refined combinations and velvet shades - that's what you've been looking for this season. Time to explore.

cardText.qualityText: Our professionals work on the best equipment for tailoring clothes of unparalleled quality.
cardText.speedText: Thanks to the well-established system at Womazing, we can sew up to 20 pieces of products in our own workshops
cardText.responsibilityText: We care about people and the planet. Waste-free production and comfortable working conditions - all this is Womazing

team.title: Dream Team Womazing
team.slideText: Every girl is unique. However, we are similar in a million little things. Womazing looks for these little things and creates beautiful things that emphasize the advantages of every girl.

cardTitle.magic: The magic is in the details

cardText.idea: Womazing was founded in 2010 and has become one of the most successful companies in our country. Like many Italian firms, Womazing remains a family company, although none of the family members are fashion designers. We follow a successful formula, using the services of well-known fashion designers to create our collections. The method has been described by fashion critic Colin McDowell as a form of design co-creation characteristic of a number of Italian prêt-a-porter companies.
cardText.magic:
The first Womazing store was opened in a small town in the north of the country in 2010. The first collection consisted of two coats and a suit, which were copies of Parisian models.

Despite the fact that the founder was a lawyer by training, her family has always been closely associated with sewing (the founder's great-grandmother made clothes for women, and her mother founded a professional school of tailoring). The desire to produce clothes for the masses carried great promise, especially at a time when high fashion still dominated and the market for quality prêt-a-porter simply did not exist.
